record.description: Gang raids at University of Chicago dance. Students who repelled an attack by young toughs discuss the fracas at Hyde Park police station. All are members of the Delta Upsilon fraternity where the fight took place. Left to right: Furber Simons, Gary Stoll, Robert Sbarge, and Ted Bronson.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached captions (combined into one), date received stamp. Thick paint on surface.
